/* Main.c file generated by New Project wizard
 *
 * Created:   Mon Mar 22 2021
 * Processor: AT89C51
 * Compiler:  Keil for 8051
 */

#include <reg51.h>


sbit LED = P3^0;

void delay(void);

void main(void)
 { 
   
   while (1)
   {
      LED=1;
      delay();
      LED=0;
      delay();
      }
 }
 
 void delay(void)
 {
    int i, j;
    
    for(i=0; i<10; i++)
    {
       for(j=0; j<5000; j++)
       {
	  
	  }
       }
    }
